scripts.install: npm run --prefix api install:dependencies && npm run --prefix web install:dependencies
scripts.build: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api build" "npm run --prefix web build"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api start:dev" "npm run --prefix web start:dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently -p "[{pid}][{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api start:prod" "npm run --prefix web start:prod"
